query:
SELECT 
  id,
  accountId,
  syncType,
  status,
  currentStep,
  progressPercent,
  startedAt,
  completedAt,
  errorMessage
FROM data_sync_jobs
ORDER BY startedAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
command:
